response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you for $9,500. I am confident that this price reflects a fair balance between the product's value and my aspiration to secure a reasonable return. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your endeavors.", "product_price": 9500}
